question:
Match the nutrients given in List I with the source in List II:

| List I | List II |
|---|---|
| 1. Vitamin A | p. Bitter gourd |
| 2. Single cell protein | q. Beans |
| 3. Vitamin C | r. Carrots |
| 4. Protein | s. Spirulina spp |
explanation: 1. Vitamin A is found in Carrots (r).
3. Vitamin C is found in Bitter gourd (p).
